app_subtitle: Supercharge your React internationalization workflow with automated extraction and zero-runtime overhead.
feature_automated_extraction_desc: Say goodbye to manual key management. Our Babel-powered CLI extracts strings directly from your JSX/TSX files.
feature_instant_translation_desc: Automatically translate your app into multiple languages using integrated APIs. Speed up your localization process.
feature_type_safe_desc: Built with TypeScript for a robust development experience. Zero runtime overhead ensures your app stays fast.
playground_intro: Experiment with i18n-turbo features in real-time.
pg_add_lang_desc: To add a new language (e.g., Italian), run this command in your terminal:
pg_run_extract_desc: After adding code, run extraction to update translation files.
example_hello: Hello! This is a translated message.
example_missing_desc: Behavior when a key doesn't exist.
footer_text: Â© 2025 i18n-turbo. Open Source MIT License.
docs_intro: Learn how to integrate i18n-turbo into your project.
cmd_extract_desc: Extracts strings from source to a translation file.
cmd_extract_lang_desc: Translates extracted strings to a target language.
cmd_merge_desc: Merges new keys without overwriting existing translations.
cmd_reverse_desc: Restores original string literals from keys.
